column2: he deserves a chance
column26: Get Johnny Depp back in pirates 6
column33: Disney: Get Johnny Depp back in pirates 6
column34:
Calling all Johnny Depp and Pirates of the Caribbean fans! I’m sure many of you have heard about his ex wife, Amber Heard’s, accusations of domestic abuse. Recent news has broke that Johnny Depp is now countersuing Amber Heard for the accusations being false and defamation of his name. The false accusations of abuse against Depp have cost him several roles, including his role in Pirates of the Caribbean 6. After the accusations, Disney moved to fire him from his long-time role as Captain Jack Sparrow and continue the franchise without him. False accusers are destroying the lives of innocent people and discrediting real victims of domestic abuse!

 


Johnny Depp is a person who brings joy to many people as himself and as the endearing characters he portrays. One of which is the mischievous Captain Jack Sparrow. Johnny has visited many kids in schools as well as sick children in hospitals as Captain Jack and always brings joy and light to those he visits. He carries his costume with him while traveling for this very reason. 

 


Our mission is to restore Johnny Depp’s reputation and restore his position of lead actor in the upcoming Pirates of the Caribbean movie. This franchise has been successful because of Johnny Depp and Captain Jack Sparrow and it would be a horrible mistake to move forward without him. Please join in signing this petition and let Disney know that thousands of people want to right this wrong. There is no Pirates of the Caribbean without Captain Jack and there is no Captain Jack without Johnny Depp! We will return Captain Jack Sparrow to this franchise!

column2:
Sisters, don't let bastards take your life.
Anita Kanitz, trade unionist, publishing house bookseller

How is it possible that hatred of women – often well organized – is spreading on so many levels and worldwide? Much has already been said and written about the threatening anti-feminist backlash and the increasing sexism against women, which seems to be gradually becoming socially acceptable.
The register of attacks and threats to women who express themselves in public is long: it ranges from personal insults to female politicians in parliament (constant heckling and laughter when women speak there are unfortunately almost common in this country worldwide), to hate mail ( often sent under the real name!) and verbal attacks as well as sexual harassment in the protection of the anonymity of the network up to very specific persecution on the street.
The systematic hostility comes to a large extent from the right, but also from the religious. Behind them are men from all walks of life. The hodgepodge of anti-feminist "movements" ranges from "masculinists," who propagate the alleged downfall of men and their natural rights, to the so-called incels, who babble about their supposed right to intercourse, which women would deny them.
It doesn't matter who is behind hate and hate speech against women: According to the motto "constant dripping wears the stone" it's about making hostilities and sexism socially acceptable through repetition, silencing women, ousting them from hard-won positions, to subordinate them and make them invisible (e.g. by means of the discussion about gendering). The goal: maintaining power to protect the privileges that men have because they are men.
A drastic example shows us the supposedly so modern America in the past few weeks in the year 2022, in the 21st century.
Actress Amber Heard should not have described herself as a victim of domestic violence, the court ruled on June 1, 2022. A shocking verdict. However, the public annihilation of Johnny Depp's ex-wife has taken place before - on social media. Why the court's decision still has dramatic consequences for all women, girls, children and also men who are victims of male violence_
In 2022, Amber Heard is caught in the crossfire of public malice, a woman who publicly came out as a victim of abuse and was sued for defamation by her ex-husband Johnny Depp. Mind you, after the oddly universally admired Johnny Depp, a well-known alcoholic, drug addict, choleric, and misogynist (who can call his ex-girlfriends cunts, sluts, blackmailers and not face a libel suit)
in London in 2020 lost a libel case against the Sun and Amber Heard. Here he was clearly convicted and labeled a woman beater by the court.
 The new American witch trial, sorry, the so-called defamation trial was now unnecessarily tried in public, in frightening to repulsive details and with the hooting of the public online. Judge Penny Azcarate had inexplicably allowed two poolside cameras to be broadcast by the American cable network Court TV so the nation could watch live as hideous details of the deeply narcissistic, physical, sexual and emotional abuse of a young woman by the superstar and millionaire, the whole horror were dragged into the public eye.
But it was Amber Heard who was stylized into pictures from the hall in Virginia on the Internet as a megara who was not in control of her own emotions and had nothing else in mind than destroying an idol. While Johnny Depp was sat in the courtroom with a conspicuously malicious grin and was celebrated by cheering supporters as she entered and left the court, while Amber Heard was badly insulted every day and received thousands of hate and threatening messages online and in the media. That's how I imagine the medieval witch trials, I was really pissed off by this disgusting trial, the misogynist actor and his idiotic mob of supporters, which probably includes ex-girlfriends, from my point of view, these women can't have a brain. Because if he was such a wonderful partner then why they  are his ex!
And why did you see them reinforced and crying in public at the time when everything with Depp was so great? And why do his women always fall down the stairs, well honestly, how many of us always fall down the stairs with the same man, that's what I call people dumbing down if I want to make someone believe it. The pop singer Lance Bass recreated a statement by Amber Heard in a Tiktok video, the language app Duolingo made fun of Heard, and pet owners had their four-legged friends portray Amber. Snippets of their statements were taken out of context. The balance of power is clear: the hashtag #JusticeForAmberHeard has 53.3 million views on TikTok, the hashtag #JusticeForJohnnyDepp has 16.2 billion views - 300 times more. A frightening balance of the worldwide, digital misogyny, only one single narcissistic manipulative man was enough to trigger it with his fans, supporters.
Amber Heard was ordered to pay Depp $15 million while Depp was ordered to pay only $2 million. It has already become known that Heard is financially ruined and is appealing, but actually has no money for it. Petitions were stopped online that wanted to support her financially, no wonder in sight of this concentrated misogyny!
Can we now herald the end of Metoo?
Yes, if there are more women around the world,  which excuse and support the perpetrators and blaming and defaming the victims. Because many of Johnny Depp's supporters are female, even describe themselves as female victims of violence or feminists, that's the real nonsense and the shame of the whole thing. It showed once again how women like to shoot each other in the knee instead of sticking together. The result is: misogyny hits absolutely everyone, in this case stupidity has to suffer in the future. At some point, everyone gets it, sooner or later, believe me.

column2: Pirates 6 will fail at the Box Office without Johnny Depp in it as Jack Sparrow.  Fans will boycott the movie without him.  And due to the overwhelming support for Johnny, this movie could have the potential to take in well over 1 Billion+, potentially breaking Box Office records.  So ... Disney needs to Publicly: (a) announce firing Sean Bailey due to his betrayal of Johnny Depp, (b) sincerely apologize & express deep remorse for allowing a victim to be villainized, (c) beg him to return, announcing that they can not & will not do Pirates 6 without him, (d) pledge a sizable donation of the movie's profits to a children's hospital in Jack Sparrow's (&/or Johnny Depp's) name, (e) offer Johnny to play guitar somewhere on the movie soundtrack, and (f) produce a short involving 1 million + 1 alpacas!

column26: Get Johnny Depp back in pirates 6
column33: Disney: Get Johnny Depp back in pirates 6
column34:
Calling all Johnny Depp and Pirates of the Caribbean fans! I’m sure many of you have heard about his ex wife, Amber Heard’s, accusations of domestic abuse. Recent news has broke that Johnny Depp is now countersuing Amber Heard for the accusations being false and defamation of his name. The false accusations of abuse against Depp have cost him several roles, including his role in Pirates of the Caribbean 6. After the accusations, Disney moved to fire him from his long-time role as Captain Jack Sparrow and continue the franchise without him. False accusers are destroying the lives of innocent people and discrediting real victims of domestic abuse!

 


Johnny Depp is a person who brings joy to many people as himself and as the endearing characters he portrays. One of which is the mischievous Captain Jack Sparrow. Johnny has visited many kids in schools as well as sick children in hospitals as Captain Jack and always brings joy and light to those he visits. He carries his costume with him while traveling for this very reason. 

 


Our mission is to restore Johnny Depp’s reputation and restore his position of lead actor in the upcoming Pirates of the Caribbean movie. This franchise has been successful because of Johnny Depp and Captain Jack Sparrow and it would be a horrible mistake to move forward without him. Please join in signing this petition and let Disney know that thousands of people want to right this wrong. There is no Pirates of the Caribbean without Captain Jack and there is no Captain Jack without Johnny Depp! We will return Captain Jack Sparrow to this franchise!

It's obvious
Disney and potc have no future without Johnny.
As the allegations against are mostly false and the request of amber's legal team to drop the case has been rejected by the court, it was a dumb-a*s decision to fire him off.
Of course it saves millions for Disney, but it's impossible to find another captain jack sparrow.
#justiceforjohnny

column2: Testimony UNDER OATH from parties on both sides of the legal battle between Depp and Heard has stated countless times that Johnny is a total sweetheart and Amber has an already existing history of domestic violence so if Johnny's former cast mate Penelope Cruz had nothing but kind words to say about him including a story about him being an absolute sweetheart and a gentleman helping her on set which she greatly appreciated considering she was pregnant at the time AND notoriously feministic J.K Rowling vouched for him and kept his role in Fantastic Beasts despite countless angry fans protesting her decision. I personally know a lot of people who were beaten and abused by people who were supposed to keep them safe and I was personally abused as a child so I have nothing but sympathy for those you have or are going through that now but also being a man with a temper who tries his best to keep his loved ones safe and support them it infuriates me how thousands of people are still standing up and accusing Johnny Depp of these disgusting things when the conflicting testimonies from Heard's team as well as her constant avoidance of questions asked in court clearly suggests Johnny innocence and the fact that, if he was really as violent and abusive as she claims then why, when the incident in Australia occurred and the end of Johnny's finger was severed, did Amber panic and sob after he left and tried to go and see him despite the then couple's staff telling her that couldn't happen when you'd think after sustaining the graphic and brutal injuries she claimed to suffer that night she'd likely be terrified to be around him and want nothing to do with him for quite some time?

column2: I'm signing because Johnny Depp is the only Caption Jack Sparrow. His take on the character is what made the franchise great. column2: Mr. Depp has been innocent all along yet had to go through hell, humiliation and hatred of the masses even without any significant proof or evidence that he was the abuser. He didn't deserve any of it and it's about time Amber Heard goes through the same and gets what she deserves. You know, fair, equal treatment and all. A manipulative liar and gold digger like her doesn't get to be in a spotlight and to be a star after she intentionally trashed his name and reputation. Unfortunately for herself, she chose to mess with a wrong man - a talented genious like Mr. Depp has billion of fans and admirers all over the world that believed him from the very beginning and they stand true and strong in his fight against his perpetrator. I'm so glad that she didn't get away with it and the truth surfaced. #Ibelievehim , #IstandwithJohnnyDepp , #JohhnyDeppisASurvivor, #AmberHeardisAnAbuser So now, I believe it's time we demand justice for Johhny Depp! He lost his role as Jack Sparrow because of Amber Heard's false accusations of domestic abuse and lies. Please, follow the link below to sign the petition to keep him in POTC franchise. Together, we are strong and powerful and can change the course of events. Disney will have to hear us and consider the fans wish . They are making movies for us, the audience, and they must consider what we want. After all, Mr. Depp is a victim here and hasn't done anything wrong to lose one of his most epic roles. Besides, POTC movies are not POTC without him. Just waste of film and time. Please, sign, share and support to make Heard really mad and not let her destroy his career he's been building all his life with hard work, unlike her. #JackSparrowforever #JohnnyDeppisJackSparrow https://www.change.org/p/disney-keep-johnny-depp-as-jack-sparrow-56940bb8-c877-482f-bf8a-ec2c57ccb32f
